Description:
Detects when full data export is attempted an unauthorized user.

Author: Muhammad Faisal (@faisalusuf)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Bitbucket Unauthorized Full Data Export Triggered
Query: sourcetype='bitbucket-audit' eql select * from _source_ where audittype.category = 'data pipeline' and audittype.action = 'unauthorized full data export triggered'
